评论概述: It's the luck of the draw on what's being sent to the customer
评论详情: The first pair of gloves were beautiful, but I was sent a size 6.5, I ordered an XXL which is a size 8.  The second pair I ordered had a very uneven cut to the fur and the leather was sort of wrinkled.  The fur was not as nice as the first gloves either.  I had hoped by ordering a third time might just be the charm.  Well, the fur was cut better, but much thinner.  They did not match up to the fur on the size 6.5 gloves.  However, the leather was better than the second pair that I received.  It's the luck of the draw!  I wished I had use for the 6.5 gloves, they were beautiful.

评论详情: I really dislike fake furs, and I was in the market for comfortable and affordable gloves (since I always lose one glove). I took a chance on these and was super impressed from the moment I saw the package. This company is true to its mission: high quality, luxury feel for an incredibly reasonable price. They are stunning. I got a size M (I'm 5'10", ~135 lbs if this matters). When I first put them on, I was worried they might be a bit too small, but after a day they fit perfectly. Could not recommend these more - I'm just worried the price will balloon if I do.
